name: Vegas! First Class, American Airlines, A321 Sharklets.
description:
Enjoy a lovely evening flight between Los Angeles and Las Vegas on one of AA's new sharklet-fitted A321S aircraft. 

Featuring the Flagship Lounge, flypast of Victorville airport at 28,000 feet, all phases of flight and a beautiful evening touchdown at Las Vegas-McCarran International.

Hope you like the video, and leave me a comment!

You can also follow me on:

Twitter, @pauls_trips

Snapchat: pauls_trips
